snippet.title: Tamagotchi Plaza – Nintendo Direct 3.27.2025
snippet.description:
Tamagotchi Plaza is coming to Nintendo Switch on June 27, 2025!

The next entry in the beloved shop simulator "Tamagotchi Connection: Corner Shop" series invites you into a whimsical world of Wonder Shops with over 100 Tamagotchi to play with. As your shop's reputation grows, new Tamagotchi will visit including a new original character. Make your shop thrive and turn the town into a bustling place!

#NintendoDirect #NintendoSwitch #TamagotchiPlaza

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://www.nintendo.com/us/

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America
X/Twitter: https://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NintendoAmerica
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nintendoamerica
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/nintendo
